home.title: Software design and development
home.sub-title: Web sites, e-commerce, mobile apps & data bases
home.why-dig: Why is it so important to increase your digital presence?
home.want-know-stadistics: Do you want to know the stadistics?

Greater-brand-recognition.info-p1: The brand of a business is something intangible and tangible at the same time. It is an element that goes far beyond its name, slogan and visual identity.
Greater-brand-recognition.info-p2: In general terms, we can say that the brand is everything with which a company is related and identified, which entails virtues, values, tone of voice, colors, products or services, price-quality ratio and much more.
Greater-brand-recognition.title: Greater brand recognition

Access-to-the-new-generations.info-p1: The companies that stand the test of time and consolidate in certain market segments are those that constantly attract and captivate new generations of consumers.
Access-to-the-new-generations.info-p2: Logically, to achieve this it is necessary to know the consumption patterns of the youngest users and their concerns, needs, problems and objectives.
Access-to-the-new-generations.title: Access to the new generations

Obtaining-relevant-data-and-information.info-p1: Once you consolidate the digital presence of your business, relevant information of interest will begin to reach you in a systematic and constant way.
Obtaining-relevant-data-and-information.info-p2: Elements as basic as user comments on social networks and the evaluation of a product in an online store make it possible to understand the public's perception and, thus, find or detect areas for improvement.
Obtaining-relevant-data-and-information.title: Obtaining relevant data and information

Statistics.title: Statistics
Statistics.info-title: In data, why is it so important to have a Digital Presence?
Statistics.info-subtitle: Do you know what happens worldwide in just 1 minute on the Internet?
Statistics.info-pr1-1: There are 4,497,420 searches on Google alone.
Statistics.info-pr1-3: LNetflix users watch a total of 694,444 hours of video.
Statistics.info-pr1-4: There are 277,777 story posts on Instagram and 55,140 posts in the feed.
Statistics.info-pr1-5: YouTube users watch a total of 4,500,000 videos.
Statistics.info-pr2-1: A figure worth delving into is the number of searches performed per minute on Google. There are approximately 6 billion searches per day around the world, and per year there are 2,190 billion. Therefore, if we do not have a presence on Google we are really wasting a tremendous opportunity.

Aboutme.title: About me
Aboutme.presentation: Hello, I'm Oscar, I've been working as a web developer since 2019. I want to share a little about my experience and what drove me to be passionate about this beautiful profession.
Aboutme.exp-1-1: I started in software development working independently, I programmed some landing pages and databases for clients in the sales and entertainment area. In 2020 I started working
Aboutme.exp-1-2: with the position of Sr. programming analyst developing with React js, React Native, Wordpress, Laravel among others, but mainly with CRM Salesforce, a technology that seems very useful and scalable to me.
Aboutme.exp-2-1: In 2023 I started a new challenge working at
Aboutme.exp-2-2: where I was assigned as a customer to
Aboutme.exp-2-3: working as a Salesforce Sr. developer. Without a doubt I can say that it was a very enriching stage in which I acquired a lot of knowledge as a Salesforce developer and consultant.
Aboutme.exp-3: I currently work independently developing web and mobile applications, promoting digital presence. Also as a Salesforce consultant and developer, offering my knowledge to give my clients the best experience in this great digital tool.
